title: What's Going On With Healthcare Logistics Giant Owens & Stock On Friday?
content: On Friday, Owens & Minor Inc. (NYSE:OMI) reported first-quarter adjusted EPS of $0.19, up from $0.05 a year ago and beating the consensus of $0.18. Adjusted net income of $14.9 million was higher than $3.6 million a year ago. The company reported sales of $2.61 billion, up 4% Y/Y, almost in line with the consensus of $2.61 billion.
